data.route_analysis: Traveling via train or car from major cities. Car rentals available. Winter sports available in local resorts.
data.seasonal_patterns: Best visited from December to March for winter activities.
data.climate: Cold temperatures, snow cover. Warm clothing and gear recommended.
data.culture: Rich traditions, winter festivals, and culinary offerings including borscht and blini.
data.attractions: Visit Kizhi Island, Saimaa Lake, and local spas with traditional Russian baths.
